chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael F Patton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Incest with Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.06(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

supervisions.notes: Psych evaluation and follow-up should be completed while incarcerated.

superMiscConds.notes: 25% of income earned while incarcerated should be deducted for child support purposes.
Secure and maintain full-time employment. No employment with anyone under the age of 16 yrs.
No contact with the victim, his wife or son .
Provide DNA sample.  Sex Offender Assessment and any follow-up. Register as sex offender and comply with requirements.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
